title: Balancing growth and preservation: Unravelling Africa's carbon-economic nexus through the environmental kuznets curve
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Claudien Habimana Simbi, Fengmei Yao, Jiahua Zhang, Dagmawe Tenaw, Juvens Sugira Murekezi, Mchura Tereza Magati, Hubert Hirwa, Ali Salem Al-Sakkaf, Alexis Kayiranga, Jia Peng
